dataSet.name: IncomeStatement
dataSet.query: SELECT ALLOWED Companies.Ref AS OurCompany, // Defined always CASE WHEN (GeneralJournalTurnovers.Account.IncomeTaxAccount)// Defined for Account sections THEN NULL ELSE AccountTypes.Ref END AS AccountType, CASE WHEN (GeneralJournalTurnovers.Account.IncomeTaxAccount)// Defined for Account sections THEN NULL ELSE CASE WHEN AccountTypes.Ref = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Income) THEN "Income" WHEN AccountTypes.Ref = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.CostOfSales) THEN "COGS" WHEN AccountTypes.Ref = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Expense) THEN "Expenses" WHEN AccountTypes.Ref = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.OtherIncome) THEN "Other Income" WHEN AccountTypes.Ref = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.OtherExpense) THEN "Other Expenses" ELSE "" END END AS AccountTypePresentation, CASE WHEN (NOT GeneralJournalTurnovers.Account IS NULL) // Defined always THEN GeneralJournalTurnovers.Account.IncomeTaxAccount ELSE False END AS IsTaxAccount, GeneralJournalTurnovers.Account AS Account, // Defined for Turnovers GeneralJournalTurnovers.DayPeriod AS DayPeriod, // Defined for Turnovers GeneralJournalTurnovers.WeekPeriod AS WeekPeriod, // Defined for Turnovers GeneralJournalTurnovers.MonthPeriod AS MonthPeriod, // Defined for Turnovers GeneralJournalTurnovers.QuarterPeriod AS QuarterPeriod, // Defined for Turnovers GeneralJournalTurnovers.YearPeriod AS YearPeriod, // Defined for Turnovers GeneralJournalTurnovers.Recorder AS Recorder, // Defined for Turnovers CASE WHEN (NOT GeneralJournalTurnovers.Account IS NULL) THEN -GeneralJournalTurnovers.AmountRCTurnover ELSE 0 END AS AmountRCTurnover // Defined always {SELECT AccountType.*, Account.*, Recorder, YearPeriod, QuarterPeriod, MonthPeriod, WeekPeriod, DayPeriod} FROM // Turnover by sections, accounts and periods by the selected account types or by income taxes AccountingRegister.GeneralJournal.Turnovers(, , Auto, (Account.AccountType IN (VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Income), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.CostOfSales), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Expense), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.OtherExpense), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.OtherIncome)) OR Account.IncomeTaxAccount = TRUE) AND (Account.OtherComprehensiveIncome = FALSE), , ) AS GeneralJournalTurnovers // Report sections of accounts (mandatory by the selected sections - see output settings sections) FULL JOIN Enum.AccountTypes AS AccountTypes ON (AccountTypes.Ref = GeneralJournalTurnovers.Account.AccountType) OR (GeneralJournalTurnovers.Account.IncomeTaxAccount AND AccountTypes.Ref = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Income)) // Assign taxes to first row of fixed sections // Our company for a possible multicompany accounting in a future LEFT JOIN Catalog.Companies AS Companies ON (Companies.Ref = VALUE(Catalog.Companies.OurCompany)) WHERE // Mandatory sections of report AccountTypes.Ref IN (VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Income), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.CostOfSales), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Expense), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.OtherExpense), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.OtherIncome)) {WHERE CASE WHEN (GeneralJournalTurnovers.Account.IncomeTaxAccount) THEN NULL ELSE AccountTypes.Ref END AS AccountType, GeneralJournalTurnovers.Account AS Account, GeneralJournalTurnovers.Recorder AS Recorder, GeneralJournalTurnovers.YearPeriod AS YearPeriod, GeneralJournalTurnovers.QuarterPeriod AS QuarterPeriod, GeneralJournalTurnovers.MonthPeriod AS MonthPeriod, GeneralJournalTurnovers.WeekPeriod AS WeekPeriod, GeneralJournalTurnovers.DayPeriod AS DayPeriod}
